featured.text: Type-A people are generally considered sensitive perfectionists and good team players, but over-anxious.
Worse yet, exposure to graphic violence and bloodshed can make them less sensitive to real-life violence and more accepting of aggression.
For example, girls are born with more sensitive hearing than boys, and the difference increases as kids grow up.
I. Irene Fostering empathy…By seeing an animal up close, the public could be encouraged to be more sensitive and compassionate to a species that is facing extinction in the wild.

other.text: People who are more sensitive to anxiety can panic after viewing a thriller.
Because they hear more, good listeners (22) to know more and to be more sensitive to what is going on around them than other people.
Girls were __(28)__ more sensitive to sounds and more skillful at fine motor performance than boys.
What is the main idea of the passage? (A) We should learn to be sensitive to pain.

definition.zh_def: 對外界刺激或情感反應強烈的，容易受到影響或傷害的。
definition.en_def: Easily affected by external stimuli or emotions; prone to being hurt or influenced.
definition.example: She is very sensitive to criticism and often takes it personally.
